pageContent: Purpose: For patients with prostate cancer, validated and reliable instruments are essential for measuring patient-reported outcomes. The aim of this study was to validate the German version of the widely established Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite with 26 items (EPIC-26).

metaData.source:
A catalog of prostate cancer nomograms
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11342918/
